text: Francia Elena M치rquez Mina (born 1 December 1981) is a Colombian human-rights and environmental activist who is the Vice President of Colombia since 2022. In August 2020, M치rquez announced her candidacy for President of Colombia in the 2022 election. She is the first Colombian woman of African descent to run for the presidency. She later became the vice presidential candidate for Gustavo Petro's presidential campaign and won the election in June 2022, becoming the country's first black female vice president. In 2019, the BBC listed Francia M치rquez on their 100 Women for that year. ==References== Category:1981 births Category:Living people Category:Vice presidents of Colombia Category:Colombian activists Category:Human rights activists Category:Environmentalists
